title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 module uses the Class.forName() method.
EB: Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class. Currently, there are no non-static methods in this class. Therefore, it would be beneficial to add a private constructor to prevent unnecessary instantiation of the class. This change will not increase the size of the class, as the compiler already provides a default public constructor. The intention is to restrict access to the constructor by making it private instead of public.
SR:
To address this issue, modify the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
Please note that I haven't tested this change, but it should have the same effect as the current implementation.
